headline: 1 Dividend Stock Down 30% to Buy and Hold for the Next Decade
summary: Biotech giant Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ: REGN) saw its fortunes reversed last year.  Regeneron's issues in the past year are almost entirely related to Eylea, a medicine for wet age-related macular degeneration, which it co-markets with Bayer.  The Eylea franchise -- including a high-dose (HD) formulation that first earned approval in 2023 -- is facing stiff competition, biosimilar and otherwise.
